name: AR04 - Báo cáo bán hàng theo doanh thu
query:
SELECT
    SUBSTRING_INDEX(tsii.income_account, '-', 1) AS 'Mã tài khoản',
    ta.account_name AS 'Tên tài khoản',
    tso.name,
    tsoi.item_group AS 'Nhóm sản phẩm',
    tsoi.item_code AS 'Mã sản phẩm',
    tsoi.item_name AS 'Tên sản phẩm',
    tsoi.uom AS 'ĐVT',
    SUM(tsoi.qty) AS 'SL',
    tsoi.rate AS 'Đơn giá',
    SUM(tsoi.net_amount) AS 'Thành tiền (Chưa thuế)'
FROM
    `tabSales Order Item` tsoi
LEFT JOIN `tabSales Order` tso ON
    tso.name = tsoi.parent
LEFT JOIN `tabSales Invoice Item` tsii ON
    tsii.sales_order = tso.name
LEFT JOIN tabAccount ta ON
    ta.name = tsii.income_account
WHERE
    tso.company = %(company)s
    AND tso.transaction_date BETWEEN DATE(%(start_date)s) AND DATE(%(end_date)s)
GROUP BY
    tsoi.rate, tsoi.item_code, tsoi.uom
report_name: AR04 - Báo cáo bán hàng theo doanh thu
